Public NotInheritable Class DynamicActivity Inherits Activity Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor
public ref class DynamicActivity sealed : System::Activities::Activity, System::ComponentModel::ICustomTypeDescriptor
type DynamicActivity = class inherit Activity interface ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 提供物件模型，這個物件模型可讓您以動態方式建構使用 ，與 WF 設計工具和執行階段互動的活動。

span.span: Provides an object model that allows you to construct activities dynamically that interface with the WF designer and runtime using .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立 。The following example shows how to create a . [!code-csharp[DynamicActivityCreation#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/dynamicactivitycreation/cs/program.cs#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 ，您不需要建立新型別，即可建立新活動。With you can create new activities without creating new types. 及其在 中相關聯的 XAML 支援，允許在 XAML 中定義新引數並由主機繫結，不需要編譯 XAML。 with its associated XAML support in allows new arguments to be defined in XAML and bound by the host without requiring XAML to be compiled.
